A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
An outstanding Star Wars adventure. It's fun\, surprising\, action packed\, true to the spirit of the originals\, and-most importantly-A GOOD ORIGINAL STORY! 

Most of the bad reviews are a result of people not liking the new direction. For as much complaining as people did about Force Awakens being "a remake of A New Hope"\, some fans seem to have wanted a remake of Empire Strikes back.

That's definitely not what we got with a The Last Jedi\, so if you're hoping for a remake instead of an outstanding new entry in the series which adds to the lore and creates new interesting characters\, I guess you'll be disappointed.
